general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct agricultural operations like irrigation, spraying, intercultural operation, and sow green fodder in moist soil. Keep fields free from weeds to minimize diseases and pests. Avoid excess use of nitrogenous fertilizers. Vaccinate poultry against Ranikhet disease.

advisory: Bacterial Leaf Blight - Control with chemical sprays like Copper Hydroxide or Plantomycin
BPH and WBPH - Control with Pymetrozine or Dinotefuran
Case Worm - Control with Fipronil or Profenofos
Powdery mildew disease management - Treat with Carbendazim or Triadimefon
Powdery mildew disease management - Treat with Carbendazim or Penconazole
Red rot disease Management - Control with Carbendazim or Metalaxyl
Powdery mildew disease management - Treat with Carbendazim or Triadimefon
Powdery mildew disease management - Treat with Carbendazim or Penconazole
Red rot disease Management - Control with Carbendazim or Metalaxyl
Fruit fly - Manage with poison bait
Yellow vain mosaic disease - Manage with yellow sticky traps and pesticide
Yellow vain mosaic disease - Manage with traps and pesticide
